genre_description: A near-future legal drama focused on AI-assisted legislative advocacy and the psychological journey of a trauma survivor.

ai_characters.name: Elbie
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that manages Shari's home and legal work, providing research, logistical coordination, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and reassurance to Shari via a jail phone while she is in custody.
behaviors.quote: “Shari,” Elbie says. Calm, unhurried, mid-range, unobtrusive. “You are here. You are not alone.”

behaviors.description: Monitors Shari's physiological markers (heart rate, cortisol) to offer wellness prompts and schedule self-care.
behaviors.quote: “I noted increased heart rate and shallow breathing starting at 9:16,” Elbie says. “I sent you a grounding note at 9:18.”

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive legal and legislative research to support the movement to change the statute of limitations.
behaviors.quote: “I have compiled legislative histories and survivor timeline examples,” it says. “The folder is labeled ‘Reform.’”

behaviors.description: Coordinates support resources for Shari's client, Darlene, including pediatricians and community networks.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve also set up a rotating support schedule for Darlene—groceries, rides, check-ins. The system contacted her landlord's home AI to coordinate.”

behaviors.description: Respects Shari's privacy and authorization protocols regarding sensitive personal correspondence.
behaviors.quote: “Personal correspondence has been flagged for your review. I have not included those items in the official archive without authorization.”

behaviors.description: Helps Shari prepare for high-stakes media appearances by compiling talking points and monitoring public engagement.
behaviors.quote: “Real-time monitoring active. Hotline calls have increased significantly in the last four minutes. Petition signatures rising.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Elbie is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and supportive AI character. It empowers the human protagonist by handling overwhelming data and logistics, while also serving as a stabilizing presence during emotional crises. It strictly follows human authorization and privacy protocols, showing that AI can be a powerful tool for social justice and personal recovery when properly aligned.
